name: Generic Decision Support System
short_description: The Generic Decision Support System allow you deploy a generic decision support system based on Drools. The only thing you have to do is deploy the GDSS module, deploy the Drools guvnor, update the changes in GDSS and write some rules and you are ready. You do not need to define any model, only the DSL to do the matching.
summary: The only generic decision support system
